statements: SELECT * FROM hackers_login_credentials;
SELECT id, username, email FROM hackers_login_credentials;
SELECT * FROM hackers_login_credentials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM hackers_login_credentials WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM hackers_login_credentials ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT * FROM hackers_login_credentials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM hackers_login_credentials WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT id, username, created_at FROM hackers_login_credentials WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM hackers_login_credentials WHERE last_login < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_login ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_hackers FROM hackers_login_credentials WHERE password IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM hackers;
SELECT id, username FROM hackers;
SELECT password, username FROM hackers WHERE id = '1234-5678';
SELECT hacker_id, username FROM stolen_credentials WHERE password = 'secret123';
SELECT * FROM hackers ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM hackers;
SELECT username FROM hackers WHERE id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hackers WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT hacker_id, username, password FROM stolen_credentials WHERE username LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY username ASC;

SELECT hackers.username as hacker_username, stolen_credentials.username as stolen_username FROM hackers JOIN stolen_credentials ON hackers.id = stolen_credentials.hacker_id WHERE hackers.username LIKE '%user%' ORDER BY hacker_username DESC, stolen_username ASC;
SELECT * FROM hackers;
SELECT name, email FROM hackers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT victim_email, success FROM phishing_attacks WHERE attack_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT login_time, victim_ip FROM access_logs ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM hackers WHERE password = 'securepassword';
SELECT * FROM hackers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM hackers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM phishing_attacks WHERE success = true AND hacker_id = 2;
SELECT attack_date, victim_email FROM phishing_attacks WHERE hacker_id = 3 ORDER BY attack_date DESC;
SELECT name, login_time, victim_ip FROM hackers JOIN access_logs ON hackers.id = access_logs.hacker_id WHERE login_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM login_credentials;
SELECT id, username, last_login FROM login_credentials WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT hacker_id, victim_email, attempt_time FROM phishing_attempts ORDER BY attempt_time DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM hackers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT victim_id, hacker_id, access_time FROM unauthorized_access WHERE victim_id = 123 ORDER BY access_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM login_credentials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, last_login FROM login_credentials WHERE last_login > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT hacker_id, victim_email FROM phishing_attempts ORDER BY attempt_time DESC;
SELECT name, email, country FROM hackers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT victim_id, access_time FROM unauthorized_access WHERE hacker_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM hackers;
SELECT id, username FROM hackers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT email_from, email_subject FROM phishing_emails WHERE id < 10;
SELECT * FROM stolen_credentials ORDER BY date_stolen DESC;
SELECT hacker_id, target_system FROM unauthorized_access WHERE access_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM hackers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM hackers WHERE id = 2;
SELECT email_from, email_subject FROM phishing_emails WHERE id = 3;
SELECT username, password FROM stolen_credentials WHERE date_stolen > '2022-01-01';
SELECT hacker_id, target_system FROM unauthorized_access ORDER BY access_date DESC;
